_comment: Configuration for UWB to Floorplan coordinate transformation

_units.origin_x: mm - X location of image top-left corner in UWB frame
_units.origin_y: mm - Y location of image top-left corner in UWB frame
_units.x_flipped: boolean - True if UWB X axis opposes Image X axis
_units.y_flipped: boolean - True if UWB Y axis opposes Image Y axis
_units.frame_id: string - Reference frame identifier for output coordinates
_units.output_units: string - Output units: meters, millimeters, or pixels
